minecraft.resource_pack.modsru: Russian localization for mods with improved translations
rpo.modsru.general.modsCreativeTabsStyle: Mod Tabs Style in Creative Inventory
Set the style for mod tab titles in the creative inventory
rpo.modsru.general.modsWordStyle.tooltip: Choose how you want the word §amod§r to be translated
rpo.modsru.general.removeModInTatar.tool: Replace "§aMod§r" in Tatar with the more native "§dOsteme§r"
rpo.modsru.general.translateJokes.toolti: Enable adaptation of foreign jokes. Sometimes attempts may be futile.
rpo.modsru.general.translateModNames.too: Enable the translation of mod names to Russian everywhere
rpo.modsru.general.translateModNamesOnAd: Enable translation of mod names in advancements. Independent of the above setting.
rpo.modsru.general.yourModloader.tooltip: Translations in the pack are universal. Specify for which loader to adapt the translations.
rpo.modsru.specific.cobblemon.apricornIn: Replace the adaptation "§aAbrizholud§r" in §dCobblemon§r with the transliteration "§aApricorn§r"
rpo.modsru.specific.cobblemon.naturaInst: Replace the popular translation of §aNature§r as "§dKharakter§r" with "§aNatura§r"
rpo.modsru.specific.cobblemon.pokemonNam: Choose whether you want to play with boring transliterations or Siyenduk's genius adaptations
rpo.modsru.specific.enigmaticLegacyColor: Color the creative inventory tabs of §aEnigmatic Legacy§r in a single color
rpo.modsru.specific.materialEnergyInstea: Replace "§dEnergiya Materii§r" in §aApplied Energistics 2§r with "§dMaterialnaya Energiya§r"
rpo.modsru.specific.modMenuEasterEggsFor: Formal Style for Easter Eggs (§aMod Menu§r)
Enable more grammatically correct writing for §dMod Menu§r Easter egg texts
rpo.modsru.specific.shortResetAllForCont: Shorten "§dSbrosit Vsyo§r" to "§dSbros Vsego§r" for the §aControlling§r button
